# objectSpecifier

**Instance Property**

Returns an object specifier for the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
var objectSpecifier: NSScriptObjectSpecifier? { get }
```

## Return Value

A fully specified object specifier to the receiver within the application.
title: objectSpecifier
